title: India closes main border crossing with Pakistan after Kashmir attack
description: India also cancels some visas held by Pakistanis and expels diplomats as tensions rise following the killing of tourists.
content:
India has announced measures targeting Pakistan, a day after 26 people were killed by gunmen in an attack in Indian-administered Kashmir.

title: Watch: Ground report from the site of air strikes in Pakistan's Muridke
description: The building, which is located in a densely-populated area, remains cordoned off by security forces.
content: BBC Urdu's Umer Draz Nangiana reports from outside a building complex in Pakistan's Muridke, which was targeted by India in its overnight air strikes. The building, which lies in a densely-populated … [+276 chars]

title: Watch: Airports closed, eerie silence in Indian-administered Kashmir
description: In Srinagar in Indian-administered Kashmir, a road, normally busy with tourists and travellers, lies deserted.
content:
In Srinagar in Indian-administered Kashmir, a road, normally busy with tourists and travellers, lies deserted.
